backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing access control, storage mixins, venture groups, user data, and automatically generated crop-based milestones.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing logo visibility updates and related asset changes with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and dialogs.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication, routing, group navigation, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/AddContributionD: Dialog for adding member contributions with amount parsing, date input, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/AddExpenseDialog: Dialog for adding group expenses with category selection, receipt upload, amount parsing, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/AddMilestoneDial: Dialog for creating a milestone with name, description, date, and optional image, then submitting via useAddMilestone.
frontend/src/components/AddPlannedPaymen: Dialog to schedule a planned payment for a group member, handling amount, date, member selection, and submission via useCreatePlannedPayment.
frontend/src/components/AddRevenueDialog: Dialog for adding revenue entries with source, amount, date, and description, submitted through useAddRevenue.
frontend/src/components/CreateGroupDialo: Dialog to create a new venture group with details like name, crop type, contribution settings, and dates, submitted via useCreateVentureGroup.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication controls, mobile menu, and optional group breadcrumb based on selectedGroup.
frontend/src/components/MyPlannedPayment: Displays the user's planned payments, grouping them into overdue and upcoming and rendering each with badges and details.
frontend/src/components/PayoutCalculator: Calculates and displays payout suggestions for a group, summarizes totals, and lets admins mark payouts as paid.
frontend/src/components/PlannedPaymentsS: Shows a group's planned payments categorized by status and allows admins to add new payments.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter basic profile information and submit it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ReceiptModal.tsx: Modal that displays a receipt image and provides an option to download it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, venture groups, crop templates, admin status, and various group-related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color tokens and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Utility functions for formatting, converting, parsing, and validating money values stored as cents.
Normalizes historically mis-scaled expense amounts and formats them for display.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Contributions.tsx: UI page that displays and manages a user's contributions across venture groups with filtering and deletion support.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard showing group statistics, profile info, and planned payments overview.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDashboard.tsx: Group-specific dashboard displaying financial metrics, progress, milestones, and recent activity, with admin access controls.
frontend/src/pages/GroupDetail.tsx: Group detail page showing contributions, expenses, milestones, activity, and actions with dialogs and delete handlers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, features list, impact points, and login CTA using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/Milestones.tsx: Milestone viewer allowing users to select a group and see completed and pending milestones with stats.
frontend/src/pages/MyGroups.tsx: Displays userâ€™s groups, searchable lists, join actions, and group creation dialog with navigation hooks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, feature requirements, and new feature requests for improving header logo visibility. Includes image update instructions and project configuration details.
